com.here.android.mpa.ar

Interface ARController.OnTapListener

  • Enclosing class:
    ARController

    public static interface ARController.OnTapListener
    Listener for tap events.

    • Method Summary

      Methods 
      Modifier and Type Method and Description
      boolean onTap(android.graphics.PointF point)
      A callback indicating a tap has occurred

    • Method Detail

      • onTap

        boolean onTap(android.graphics.PointF point)
        A callback indicating a tap has occurred
        Parameters:
        point - A PointF representing the touch point
        Returns:
        If true, event is consumed, false otherwise. If true is returned, touch action will no longer be performed by the controller.
